alert.note: Alert for Butler; Edmonson; Grayson; Hart (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 3:11PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hart, Butler, Grayson and Edmonson Counties through 245 PM CST... At 210 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Morgantown, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Hart, southern Grayson, northern Edmonson and northeastern Butler Counties, including the following locations... Rock Creek, Aberdeen, Black Gold, Eden, Peonia, Sadler, Gilstrap, Sunfish, Huff and Black Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
